DOC.brief_summary: Arterial inflammation will be compared using PET scanning in 3 groups: 1) Non-smokers, 2) Tobacco cigarette smokers, 3) Electronic cigarette users.
DOC.detailed_description: Qualified participants will undergo a singe PET/CT to detect arterial inflammation.
DOC.criteria: Healthy Nonsmokers OR Daily ecigarette user OR Daily tobacco cigarette smoker Cardiac disease Respiratory Disease Diabetes mellitus
